issue.title: [C++] Add readahead iterator
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6764](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6764). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This could replace the current ad-hoc ReadaheadSpooler, at least for JSON.
CSV currently uses non-zero padding, but it could switch to the same strategy as JSON (i.e. keep track of partial / completion blocks).
